document.title: 2012 Conference Abstracts: Annual Undergraduate Research Conference at the Interface of Biology and Mathematics

author.organization: National Institute for Mathematical and Biological Synthesis (NIMBioS)

document.abstract:
URC Schedule and Abstract Book for the Fourth Annual Undergraduate Research Conference at the Interface of Biology and Mathematics

Date: November 17-18, 2012
Plenary speaker: Christine E. Heitsch, Associate Professor of Mathematics at Georgia Institute of Technology
Featured speaker: John W. Glasser, Center for Disease Control
